mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, COUNT(G.GOOD_NUMBER) AS goodCount, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE FROM DR_BOARD B LEFT JOIN DR_USER U ON B.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN DR_GOOD G ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = G.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = '자유게시판' GROUP BY B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE ORDER BY B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, COUNT(G.GOOD_NUMBER) AS goodCount, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE FROM DR_BOARD B LEFT JOIN DR_USER U ON B.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN DR_GOOD G ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = G.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = '자유게시판' GROUP BY B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE ORDER BY goodCount DESC, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, COUNT(G.GOOD_NUMBER) AS goodCount, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE FROM DR_BOARD B LEFT JOIN DR_USER U ON B.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN DR_GOOD G ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = G.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = '꿀팁게시판' GROUP BY B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE ORDER BY B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_TEXT, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME, P.PHOTO_LOCAL, COUNT(G.GOOD_NUMBER) AS goodCount FROM DR_BOARD B JOIN DR_USER U ON B.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN DR_GOOD G ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = G.BOARD_NUMBER LEFT JOIN DR_PHOTO P ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = P.PHOTO_NUMBER WHERE B.BOARD_NUMBER = #{boardNumber} GROUP BY B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_TEXT, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME, P.PHOTO_LOCAL

SELECT R.REPLY_NUMBER, U.USER_NICKNAME, R.REPLY_WRITE_DATE, R.REPLY_TEXT, P.PHOTO_LOCAL FROM DR_REPLY R JOIN DR_USER U ON R.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER JOIN DR_BOARD B ON R.BOARD_NUMBER = B.BOARD_NUMBER JOIN DR_PHOTO P ON U.USER_NUMBER = P.PHOTO_NUMBER WHERE R.BOARD_NUMBER = #{boardNumber}
